item.title: Sunday Menu
item.description: Sunday Menu Appetisers Homemade Soup - Starter: £6 / Main: £8 Served with rustic bread and butter. Please ask at the bar for the choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise. Halloumi Fries (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise. Mini Breaded Chicken Fillets - £6 Served with a salad garnish and mayonnaise. Sunday Roasts All Sunday Roasts use local butcher sourced meats and are served with roast potatoes, roast parsnips, homemade Yorkshire Pudding, sage & onion stuffing, cauliflower cheese, and a selection of seasonal vegetables.

In an attempt to attain viable trade, balanced with customer safety regulations, we have been forced to implement the following provisional dining-in terms: Booking It is strongly advised that you pre-books tables, especially on Friday evening, Saturday evening and the Sunday Lunch services. Booking terms & conditions will be explained at the time of booking.
